Articles.Content:
I think they should add controllers like the Logitech EXTREME 3D Pro.

 

Or any others.

I mean, I know they have some controllers. But i want them to add more.

Welcome to the forums, The Logitech Extreme 3D Pro works just fine in KSP.

All XInput flight stick controllers should work in KSP.  That makes up about 99% of PC game controllers still on the market today.

 

 

Edited April 19, 2017 by Alshain
